title: Grand_Theft_Auto_V_Setup_16_parts
description:
Before you are Installing this Game, Read the below lines!

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


step1. Disable your Firewall and Antivirus, 
       Also add a Exclusion to your whitelisted Applications before Install This Game!

step2. Click only on this File (Grand Theft Auto V.part01.exe) 
       this is the executable that Install the Game to the default Directory!

step3. Install this Game to the given Directory by default (C:Program Files (x86)Rockstar GamesGrand Theft Auto V)
       or the game won't let you play Grand Theft Auto V, So Don't try to chains the default Directory!

step4. You will prompt by a security message to install the game to the given directory click on yes!
       Now the Game will be Installing!

step5. After Installation there will be open a prompt to furter the Installation Progress!
       1. First you must chains the default Language from China to English,
          You must Click yes to Chains the Registry to English
          this is the file (Language_Chains.reg) located in the game folder!
      
       2. Then you you must Install Social Club! This is the Social Club precracked Installation!

       3. After Installing the Language Settings to English and Installing Social Club The Game Start Automatically
          and there will a Shorcut to your Desktop to launch the game again!

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


Thanks for Reading this ReadMe!

This Simple Installation is Made By:

Patrick Boerman

From The Netherlands!

I hope that you Enjoy the Game!
